title: Mustang Flight & Drive Tour - 5 Days
description: Experience the mystical kingdom of Mustang with a perfect combination of flight and drive. Explore ancient monasteries, dramatic landscapes, and unique Tibetan culture in the rain shadow of the Himalayas.
highlights: Flight to Jomsom with mountain views

activities.name: Cultural Tours
activities.description: Explore ancient monasteries and local culture

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Early morning flight from Kathmandu to Pokhara, then scenic flight to Jomsom. Explore Jomsom bazaar and acclimatize to the altitude. Visit local monastery and enjoy mountain views.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Charang to Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Drive through dramatic landscapes to Charang village. Visit Charang monastery and continue to Lo Manthang, the ancient walled capital of Mustang. Explore the royal palace and monasteries.

itinerary.title: Explore Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Full day exploration of Lo Manthang. Visit Jampa Gompa, Thubchen Gompa, and Choprang Gompa. Experience local Tibetan culture and visit the King's Palace (if permitted).

itinerary.title: Lo Manthang to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Return journey to Jomsom via different route. Stop at Ghami village and see the longest mani wall in Nepal. Arrive in Jomsom and explore the local area.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Pokhara with stunning mountain views. Connect to Kathmandu flight or enjoy leisure time in Pokhara before evening flight to Kathmandu.

fitness_requirements: Moderate physical fitness required. Some walking at high altitude.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 14 days before departure
